name: Lake Rotoiti fixed buoy data
description: This dataset contains high-frequency environmental measurements collected by a fixed sensor buoy deployed in Lake Rotoiti. The buoy was equipped with a temperature string spanning the water column, along with surface sensors for chlorophyll-a, and dissolved oxygen. Additional dissolved oxygen measurements were recorded at the lake bottom. A meteorological station mounted on the buoy recorded atmospheric conditions including wind speed, and wind direction. These observations support the characterization of physical, chemical, and biological dynamics in Lake Rotoiti over time.

spatialCoverage.name: Lake Rotoiti in the Bay of Plenty region in New Zealand.

variableMeasured.name: reference
variableMeasured.description: Reference point, can be either depth (d), height (h) or elevation (e)

variableMeasured.name: low
variableMeasured.description: Low value to set values to NA if they are below this value

variableMeasured.name: high
variableMeasured.description: High value to set values to NA if they are above this value

variableMeasured.name: roc
variableMeasured.description: Rate of change to set values to NA which change from the previous value by greater than this value

variableMeasured.name: consec
variableMeasured.description: Set values to NA if there are consecutive values greater than this value

variableMeasured.name: interp
variableMeasured.description: Interpolate values if there is a data gap less than this value

variableMeasured.name: reference_type
variableMeasured.description: Type of reference (e.g. buffer, saturated water)
